DOC.brief_summary: Primary objective ass strawberry intake LDL cholesterol association atherosclerosis development .
DOC.detailed_description: The trial design randomize , 2-arm , 2-sequence , within-subject , cross-over , chronic feeding study . The arm study include regular consumption strawberry strawberry-placebo powder equivalent ~3.5 serving strawberries/day ( 50g ) freeze-dried strawberry powder ( provided twice day , 25 gram time > 6h apart ) . A planned sample size 50 men woman enrol study . This study require one initial screen visit , 4 study visit , 6 weekly visit . This study take approximately 12 week per subject complete . The initial screening visit provide subject inform consent document determine subject eligibility anthropometric measurement , vital sign , fast blood glucose test ( finger prick ) , fast blood draw , completion survey relate general eating , health , exercise habit . If willing eligible participate , 3-day food record ( 2 weekday 1 weekend day ) instruct Screening Visit collect study day 1 ass subject ' baseline dietary intake pattern . Subjects instruct follow strictly limit polyphenolic diet 7 day prior study throughout participation time , maintain usual diet pattern physical activity , counsel staff investigator and/or Registered Dietitian . A dinner meal provide day study visit control second meal effect food beverage intake night study visit . Subject arrive center fast state least 10 hour , well hydrate rest . Each study visit require blood draw throughout visit . After evaluation subject 's health status ( via anthropometric , vital sign blood glucose measurement in-person interview ) , Licensed health care professional take fast blood draw butterfly needle . Subjects randomize receive placebo treatment beverage base randomize treatment sequence 4 study visit . The sequence receive beverage treatment visit randomly assign one two follow sequence : placebo- treatment beverage treatment beverage -placebo . Each study visit involve blood sample collection time point 0h ( fast ) assessment change plasma lipid lipoprotein marker . Each study visit involve 2 flow mediate dilatation procedure assess endothelial function .
DOC.criteria: Men postmenopausal woman ( without menses 1 year ) moderate hypercholesterolemia define LDL cholesterol 115mg/dl165mg/dl total cholesterol > 160mg/dl preferred exceed 240mg/dl 4069 year age Body Mass Index ( BMI ) range 25 38.9 kg/m2 Nonsmoker No clinical evidence cardiovascular , metabolic , respiratory , renal , gastrointestinal hepatic disease Not take medication would interfere outcomes study , i.e . lipid lower medication , antiinflammatory drug , dietary supplement , etcâ€¦ Able provide inform consent Able comply perform procedure request protocol Weight stable : gain lose weight +/ 5 kg previous 3 month Men woman smoke Past smoker : abstinence minimum 2 year Men woman know suspected food intolerance , allergy hypersensitivity Men woman know have/diagnosed diabetes mellitus Men woman fast blood glucose concentration > 110mg/dL Men woman uncontrolled blood pressure > 120 mmHg/80 mmHg Men woman document vascular disease , e.g. , heart failure , myocardial infarction , stroke , angina , related surgery , etc ... Men woman cancer nonmelanoma skin cancer previous 5 year Women know pregnant intend become pregnant course study Women breastfeed Taking medication dietary supplement may interfere outcome study ; e.g. , antioxidant supplement , antiinflammation , lipid lower medication , blood pressure lower medication , etc ... Subjects may choose go dietary supplement ( require 30 day washout ) ; e.g. , fish oil , probiotic , etc ... Men woman donate blood within 3 month Screening Visit blood donors/participants participation study result donate 1500 milliliter blood previous 12 month . Men woman vegan Substance ( alcohol drug ) abuse within last 2 year Excessive coffee tea consumer ( > 4 cups/d ) polyphenol consumer ( > 2 cup fresh/day Men woman excessive exercise regularly athlete Unstable weight : gain lose weight +/ 5 kg previous 3 month Women take unstable dose brand hormonal contraceptive and/or stable dose brand less 6 month .
